title: truffle-config.js      命令truffle migrate network rinkeby部署报错！所有文件上传github
body:
Compiling your contracts...
===========================
> Everything is up to date, there is nothing to compile.
> Something went wrong while attempting to connect to the network at http://127.0.0.1:7545. Check your network configuration.

Could not connect to your Ethereum client with the following parameters:
    - host       > 127.0.0.1
    - port       > 7545
    - network_id > 5777
Please check that your Ethereum client:
    - is running
    - is accepting RPC connections (i.e., "--rpc" or "--http" option is used in geth)
    - is accessible over the network
    - is properly configured in your Truffle configuration file (truffle-config.js)

Truffle v5.5.13 (core: 5.5.13)
Node v16.15.0

Hey @kimpace19882627, you will need to provide a network configuration that will allow Truffle to deploy to Rinkeby. You can find more info about using Truffle's configuration file [here](https://trufflesuite.com/docs/truffle/reference/configuration/). Let me know if you have any specific questions.
@kkimpace19882627 Thanks for opening this! We will close this for issue maintenance now.  If you still have the issue,  feel free to open a new issue.
